General.Name: Golden Prospect Precious Metals Ltd
General.Description: Golden Prospect Precious Metals Ltd. is a close ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by CQS Asset Management Ltd. It is co-managed by CQS Cayman Limited Partnership. The fund invests in public equity markets. It invests in stock of companies operating in the precious metal sector. Golden Prospect Precious Metals Ltd. was formed on October 16, 2006 and is domiciled in Channel Islands.
